title: [QUESTION] Text rendering and escape sequences?
body:
I'm currently struggling to get Skia to interpret escape sequences within a string...

SKPain.MeasureText() seems to ignore escape sequences entirely. If I include a newline command (\n), it still measures the text as a single line. (Which is obviously not what I would expect from a text measureing function)

And when I draw a text which contains escape sequences, the sequence gets replaced by an "empty rectangle" character (No glyph found for that character), instead of hiding it and drawing a second line.

Am I doing something wrong? Or is there a different way to process text in skia?
